MetaData.MetaDataItem: Press and hold the Action button that you can find on the product's housing for 10 seconds and then release. This procedure should only be used when the primary controller is inoperable.
Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into inclusion mode, short press the product’s Action button that you can find on the product's housing.

Aeon Labs Home Energy Meter Gen5 is a Z-Wave device that can monitor the total amount of electricity of your home. It can report the wattage energy usage and KWH usage to a Z-Wave Controller (especially a gateway). In near real-time you’ll have a full understanding of how much electricity you use and when you use it. Products that are Z-Wave certified can be used and communicate with other Z-Wave certified devices. Also a tool that can be programmed, scheduled, controlled and communicated with from anywhere in the world.
Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into exclusion mode, short press the product’s Action button that you can find on the product's housing.

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/1289/xml
Updated Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/1596/xml
Updated Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/2046/xml

Value.label: Power, energy detection mode
Value.Help: For parameters of 101 ~ 103, power, energy detection mode configuration

Value.label: Selective reporting
Value.Help: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

Value.label: Wattage Threshold Whole HEM
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C1
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C2
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C3
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change Whole HEM
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C1
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C2
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C3
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

Value.label: Reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command
Value.Help: Enable /disable reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command.

Value.label: Reset #101-103
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group1. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Reset #111-113
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 111-113

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1.

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3

Value.label: Lock/Unlock Configuration
Value.Help: Lock/ unlock all configuration parameters

Value.label: Reset To Factory Defaults
Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
